about_the_game:
The killer synthwave soundtrack to Rats, Bats, and Bones!

Tracklist:
1 - Main Menu
2 - Prepare Yourself
3 - Old Road
4 - Creeptacular
5 - Castle
6 - Occult
7 - Hellish
8 - Vampires
9 - Magma
10 - The Underworld
11 - Dark Portal
